verbs.description: The summit [V: was] canceled Thursday morning after President Trump cited " tremendous anger and open hostility " from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
[ARG1: The summit] was [V: canceled] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday morning] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump cited " tremendous anger and open hostility " from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
The summit was canceled Thursday morning after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: cited] [ARG1: " tremendous anger and open hostility " from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
